title: テンプレートフォルダーについて
content: テンプレートフォルダーが2つあります。 1つ削除したいのですが削除ができません。 右クリックをしても削除項目がありません。 消えないフォルダの削除を方法を教えていただきたいです。
creator: s.nakato

title: thunderbird won't accept my passwords for outgoing server and it times out,  on one computer and does on another.
content: I have tried for weeks to fix this. On my webmail both email addresses work well with passwords. And I have two windows computers and one the thunderbird works well no problem in getting and sending emails. On the other I receive the emails okay and it's set up just as the other in incoming and outgoing settings and passwords but doesn't send emails as the server times out it says in error message.
creator: golfwidow1

title: Email quit working
content: Have not received any new emails past 2 weeks on laptop. I can’t even log in. Not problem receiving on desktop computer. Our internet server said no problem on their end. I followed solutions in Download manual. Got to last step on each one but always said configuration problem with user name or password. Of course won’t go any further. I’m lost!!!
creator: jolson13
